Author: paul
Content: It's not super related, but might be interesting if you need to send a lot of email. Also, the Google paper is a good read for learning more about how the Gmail spam filter works.

Author: brett
Content:
Is anyone else stunned by the quality and quantity of content he's being producing?

Author: brett
Title: Marc Andreessen: Essential HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, and miscellaneous cheatsheets

Author: palish
Content: Does this really have anything to do with startups?  Besides the fact that most internet users send e-mail, I can't think of a reason why this article would apply.

Author: ralph
Content:
The news and best links don't help avoid the long tail. best is too static; it rarely changes. And http://news.ycombinator.com/rss presents too much dross. Dross which is hard to for my brain to filter because each item has too little info so I end up having to visit every thread and then often each linked external article.

(Thanks for starting to add (comments) to the title.)
